title: Patching LLVM and rustc
snippet: This post is just an aside; As I mentioned in my last post, there is a compiler bug in LLVM that is resulting inincorrect code being generated for AVR with Rust. I made some vague assertions in a footnote about “just follow thedirections and you’ll be fine” because I couldn’t remember how to do ...
